metadata.name: Reverie - Touhou Combinations
metadata.description:
Use Touhou character items in the Binding of Isaac! Including items or trinkets of all characters in Touhou Project and Secret Sealing, 9 new bosses, and 3 new characters! ...And a secret ending!
Formerly known as Cuerzor's Touhou Items, it was renamed to Reverie - Touhou Combinations on November 5, 2021.
This mod also contains a mode for players who like balanced items, called Lunatic Mode, you can print "thlunatic" in Debug Console, or use Mod Config Menu(https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681875787) to open this mode.
You can post suggestions or bug reports in the discussions using English or Chinese!
The mod is completely open source, you are welcome to help improve the mod, and use the mod to learn mod creation.
See more information in Documentation.txt in mod folder.
